upgrades.changelog:
Includes firmware versions: 10.0, 10.10, 10.20, 10.30, 10.40.
*  Fixed central scene bug for control of its own load in smart bulb mode.
* Added parameter 32 to disable LED blinking when a setting is changed.
* Changed the manual operation for disabling the relay (smart bulb mode): Hold the UPPER paddle for 10 seconds until the LED indicator starts blinking, then within 2 seconds, tap the upper paddle 5 times quickly to change this mode. The LED indicator will stay solid green for 3 seconds to confirm the change.
* Improved the factory reset procedure: The switch will not lock up if the factory reset is not successful in certain scenarios.
